title: Windows10
body: I just updated my laptop to the latest windows 10 update and when i am in game on League of Legends it always crashes and never changes until i restart my laptop by holding the button that turns it on... is there a solution for it please and thank you

replies.body: A recent Windows 10 update made a few changes, including the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which appears to cause league to crash for some players.  As a first step, try disabling that to fix this up.  Let me know if you still have any issues after!
Can you please show me how to disable the xbox game bar i moved back the early update but still im having the same problem

"HYPERIONESQUE Yesterday at 17:27
Hello,

We are aware of issues with W10 recent updates and LoL. Can you try this tutorial?

To turn off the Game DVR feature in the Windows 10, please do the following:

Open the Xbox app by going to the Search bar on the bottom left of the screen and typing "Xbox"
Click on the Settings (Gear) icon on the left.
Click on Game DVR at the top.
Click on the On/Off (switch) under "Record game clips and screenshots using Game DVR" to turn it off. (it should be gray and set to "Off")

More context:
https://np.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4y4j5p/if_you_have_windows_10_and_you_have_lag_spikes/

http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html

hyperionesque, Player Support Specialist"
